DOC.brief_title: Effect Vision Therapy Myopic Children With Poor Accommodative Response
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Specific aim propose clinical trial : 1.1 To provide definitive proof vision therapy ( VT ) improve accommodative function myopic child compare result treatment group placebo group . 1.2 To minimize influence confound variable randomly assign intervention . 1.3 To observe longitudinal effect VT accommodation system effect axial length . 2 . Hypothesis : VT improve accommodative function 8-12 year old Chinese myopic child poor accommodative response .
DOC.criteria: Subjects enrol trial must : within age range 8 12 year old inclusive 0.75D 4.50Dspherical equivalent cycloplegic autorefraction eye astigmatism≤1.5D eye anisometropia≤1.0D monocular accommodation lag near ( 33cm ) right eye noncycloplegic autorefraction≧1D vision correctable least 0.8 good eye . Subjects enrol trial must NOT : current prior use PALs , bifocals , contact lenses either eye ( prior current use SVLs allow ) history follow functional defect : strabismus , amblyopia , nystagmus history diabetes seizure history ocular systemic , neurodevelopmental condition might influence refractive development use ocular systemic medication contain atropine , pirenzepine , antiepileptic medication recent 3 month history ocular surgery might influence refractive development developmental disability , attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) , learn disability diagnosis child investigator 's discretion would interfere officebased treatment relocation anticipate 1 year birth weight low 1250 grams（2lbs,12oz） sibling study .
